example.name: both arguments
example.text: That is not relevant to our discussion.

example.name: both args
example.text: You can say we 're all humans blah blah blah but we do n't currently group ourselves as humans hence no one cares what a human achieves , it 's only when-1 it 's relevant to your community [*-1] you care .
